import React from "react"; import { Pane, Text, Button, Heading, Table, Menu, Popover, MoreIcon, IconButton, Position } from "evergreen-ui"; import profiles from './JsonTestFiles/profiles.json' import bookingHistory from './JsonTestFiles/bookingHistory.json' import background from "./Img/MyBookings.jpg"; function MyBookingsPage() { return (
My Bookings





View your past seat bookings {/* Current Booking Table */} Current Booking Booking ID Date & Time Seat ID Ratings {profiles.map(profile => ( alert("Seat #" + profile.seatID)}> {profile.identification} {profile.timeBooked} {profile.seatID} {profile.ratings} ))}
{/* Booking History Table */} Booking History Booking ID Date & Time Seat ID Ratings {bookingHistory.map(bookingHistory => ( alert("Seat #" + bookingHistory.seatID)}> {bookingHistory.identification} {bookingHistory.timeBooked} {bookingHistory.seatID} {bookingHistory.ratings} ))}
); } export default MyBookingsPage;
